backup-domain.desc: Backup one or more virtual servers

change-password.desc: Changes the password of some Virtualmin user.

copy-mailbox.desc: Copy mail from one location to another, perhaps converting formats.

create-admin.desc: Creates an extra administrator for a virtual server

create-database.desc: Creates a database for a virtual server

create-plan.desc: Creates a new account plan for use with virtual servers.

create-redirect.desc: Adds a web redirect or alias to some domain

create-rs-container.desc: Creates a new empty Rackspace container.

create-shared-address.desc: Adds an IP address for use by multiple virtual servers

create-simple-alias.desc: Adds a mail alias to some domain, with simple parameters

create-template.desc: Creates a template for use by new domains.

create-user.desc: Create a mail, FTP or database user

delete-admin.desc: Deletes an extra administrator from a virtual server

delete-domain.desc: Delete one or more virtual servers.

delete-php-directory.desc: Remove any custom version of PHP for some directory

delete-redirect.desc: Removes a web redirect or alias from some domain

delete-rs-file.desc: Deletes a single file from a Rackspace container.

delete-s3-file.desc: Deletes a single file from an S3 bucket.

delete-script.desc: Un-install one script from a virtual server

delete-shared-address.desc: Removes an IP address that can be used by virtual servers

delete-user.desc: Delete a mail, FTP or database user

disable-feature.desc: Turn off some features for a virtual server

disable-limit.desc: Removes access to some feature or edit capability for some virtual servers

disconnect-database.desc: Removes a database from the control of a virtual server.

download-rs-file.desc: Downloads a single file from a Rackspace container.

download-s3-file.desc: Downloads a single file from an S3 bucket.

enable-feature.desc: Turn on some features for a virtual server

enable-limit.desc: Grants access to some feature or edit capability for some virtual servers

fix-domain-permissions.desc: Set correct permissions on a domain's home directory.

fix-domain-quota.desc: Set the Unix quotas for some domains to match the Virtualmin configuration.

generate-cert.desc: Generate a new self-signed cert or CSR for a virtual server.

get-dns.desc: Output all DNS records for a domain.

get-logs.desc: Output webserver logs for a domain.

get-ssl.desc: Output SSL certificate information for a domain.

get-template.desc: Outputs all settings in a template.

import-database.desc: Adds an existing database to a virtual server

info.desc: Show general information about this Virtualmin system.

install-cert.desc: Replace the SSL certificate or private key for a virtual server.

list-admins.desc: Lists administrators belonging to a virtual server

list-aliases.desc: List aliases for a virtual server

list-available-shells.desc: List all shells for use with domain owners and mailboxes

list-bandwidth.desc: Shows bandwidth usage for some domain over a date range

list-certs.desc: Output the certificates for some or all virtual servers.

list-custom.desc: List custom fields for virtual servers

list-databases.desc: Lists databases for some virtual server

list-features.desc: Lists features available when creating a domain

list-gcs-buckets.desc: Lists all buckets owned by the Google Cloud Storage.

list-gcs-files.desc: Lists all files in a Google Cloud Storage bucket.

list-mailbox.desc: Dump inbox email for one user

list-php-directories.desc: List all directories in which a specific version of PHP has been activated

list-php-ini.desc: Show PHP variables for some or all domains.

list-php-versions.desc: Lists the available PHP versions on this system.

list-plans.desc: List available account plans for new domains

list-redirects.desc: Lists web redirects and aliases in some domain

list-rs-containers.desc: Lists all containers owned by a Rackspace account.

list-rs-files.desc: Lists all files in a container owned by a Rackspace account.

list-s3-buckets.desc: Lists all buckets owned by an S3 account.

list-s3-files.desc: Lists files in one S3 bucket.

list-scheduled-backups.desc: Outputs a list of scheduled backups

list-scripts.desc: Display script installed into some virtual server

list-shared-addresses.desc: Lists shared IP addresses for virtual servers

list-simple-aliases.desc: Lists mail aliases in a simple format for some domain

list-templates.desc: List available templates for new domains

list-users.desc: List users in a virtual server

lookup-domain-daemon.desc: A background process for looking up user details.

migrate-domain.desc: Imports a virtual server from some other product

modify-admin.desc: Updates an extra administrator for a virtual server

modify-custom.desc: Modify custom fields for a virtual server

modify-database-hosts.desc: Adds or removes an allowed MySQL host for some or all domains

modify-database-pass.desc: Changes the MySQL or PostgreSQL password for some domain.

modify-database-user.desc: Changes the MySQL or PostgreSQL login for some domain.

modify-domain.desc: Change parameters of a virtual server

modify-limits.desc: Changes the owner limits for some virtual server

modify-mail.desc: Change mail-related settings for some domains

modify-php-ini.desc: Changes PHP variables for some or all domains.

modify-plan.desc: Modifies an existing account plan for use with virtual servers.

modify-proxy.desc: Changes a proxy balancer from some domain

modify-template.desc: Changes one or more settings in a template.

modify-user.desc: Change attributes of a mail, FTP or database user

modify-web.desc: Change a virtual server's web configuration

move-domain.desc: Change the owner of a virtual server

notify-domains.desc: Send email to some or all virtual server owners.

rename-domain.desc: Change the domain name, home directory or username of a virtual server.

resend-email.desc: Re-send the signup email for a domain

restore-domain.desc: Restore one or more virtual servers

run-all-webalizer.desc: Run Webalizer reports for all virtual servers

set-global-feature.desc: Turns on or off some Virtualmin feature or plugin globally.

set-php-directory.desc: Set the version of PHP to run in some directory

test-imap.desc: Checks if IMAP login to some server works.

test-pop3.desc: Checks if POP3 login to some server works.

test-smtp.desc: Checks if the mail server can RCPT to some address

transfer-domain.desc: Move a virtual server to another system.

unalias-domain.desc: Convert an alias domain into a sub-server.

unsub-domain.desc: Convert a sub-domain into a sub-server.

upload-rs-file.desc: Uploads a single file to a Rackspace container.

upload-s3-file.desc: Uploads a single file to an S3 bucket.

validate-domains.desc: Check the configuration of virtual servers
